package.name: amqp
package.summary: Communicate with any AMQP compliant server
package.description: This extension can communicate with any AMQP spec 0-9-1 compatible server, such as RabbitMQ, OpenAMQP and Qpid, giving you the ability to create and delete exchanges and queues, as well as publish to any exchange and consume from any queue.

release.notes: - #48763, ZipArchive produces corrupted archive (dani dot church at gmail dot com) - Fixed regression in the overwrite mode - Fixed binary mode with FCGI on Windows
